resources.string: Kufanele wamukele imvume yendawo ukuze i-Securitly isebenze
I-Securitly idinga ukwazi indawo yakho ngaso sonke isikhathi

Uyafuna ukunika amandla indawo yakho?
Iya kokuthi Izilungiselelo -> Izinhlelo zokusebenza -> Securitly -> Vumela indawo njalo.

Bese uqala kabusha i-Securitly
Thumela umlayezo ophuthumayo uma izinga lebhethri likhona
Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukusetha kabusha idatha ezenzakalelayo?
Ingabe ufuna ukususa lo oxhumana naye ohlwini lwakho loxhumana nabo?

1. I-Securitly idinga ukwazi indawo yakho ngaso sonke isikhathi. Ukuze wenze lokho, hamba kuzilungiselelo zedivayisi yakho -> izinhlelo zokusebenza -> Securitly -> Izimvume futhi ushintshe imvume yendawo ukuze "Vumela ngaso sonke isikhathi".
2.Ungaphoqeleli ukuvala i-Securitly. Uma kungenjalo, umlayezo wakho ophuthumayo ngeke uthunyelwe koxhumana nabo.
3. Asincomi ukuthi usethe ileveli yebhethri ozothumela kuyo umlayezo wakho ophuthumayo ku-1 noma ku-2%, njengoba idivayisi yakho ingase ivale ngaphambi kokuthumela umlayezo.

Lolu hlelo lokusebenza lwenziwa abafundi abangu-5 abavela eTechnological Institute of Laguna, Mexico. Le phrojekthi yaqala njengombono esasizimisele ngawo ukwenza into engokoqobo, futhi sihlangene nomeluleki wethu, unjiniyela uGerardo, senze senzeka. Ngalolu hlelo lokusebenza sithemba ukufaka isandla kancane ngesimo samanje emhlabeni.

Indawo yokugcina yedivayisi yami kube:
i-latitude:
40.776570
ubude: -73.969979
I-Central Park West Historic District
ENew York, ngo-10024, EE. UU.
I-Securitly ayikwazi ukusebenza ngoba imvume yokuthi "Thumela i-SMS" ayinikiwe
I-Securitly ayikwazi ukusebenza ngoba imvume yokuthi "Indawo Njalo" ayinikiwe. I-Securitly idinga ukwazi indawo yakho ukuze ithumele indawo yakho yokugcina eyaziwayo koxhumana nabo obakhethile
Kube nephutha ekutholeni indawo encozululiwe yale divayisi
Ungabonisi "indawo edingekayo" vela lapho i-Securitly iqala
